description: Subtlety that Speaks Volumes Tint & Texture Add a pop of color to your iPad. Designed with a transparent finish that is velvety smooth and soft to the touch. Shield Series: Powerful Protection that’s Impossibly Thin The Shield Sheer Matte is proof positive that less is more. The polycarbonate plastic gives every Shield case its low profile, while still being tough enough to withstand everyday wear and tear. CompatibilityiPad mini
title: Belkin Snap Shield Sheer Matte Case for Apple iPad mini (Violet)
